name: 胡憲倫
objective:
本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.
schedule:
1　　2/18　　企業永續發展及生命週期與系統思考介紹(Corporate Sustainability, Life Cycle and Systems Thinking)
2　　2/25　　生命週期管理介紹(Life Cycle Management, LCM)：概論(Introduction)、工具及案例(Tools and Cases)
3　　3/3　　ISO 14040系列與生命週期評估(LCA含軟體)介紹 (Introduction to LCA, including ISO 14040 series and SimaPro Software)
4　　3/10　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：目標及範疇界定 (Goal and Scope Definition) 
5　　3/17　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期盤查分析(Life Cycle Inventory Analysis)
6　　3/24　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期盤查分析及生命週期衝擊評估(Life Cycle Inventory Analysis and Life Cycle Impact Assessment) 
7　　3/31　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期衝擊評估(Life Cycle Impact Assessment)
8　　4/7　　生命週期評估方法(LCA Methodology)：生命週期結果闡釋、不確定及敏感度分析(Interpretation and Uncertainty and Sensitivity Analysis)
9　　4/14　　期中考(Mid-term Exam)
10　　4/21　　簡化的生命週期評估及社會/永續生命週期評估(Streamlined LCA and Social/ Sustainability Life Cycle Assessment)
11　　4/28　　歐盟環境足跡介紹(EU Environmental Footprint)
12　　5/5　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：碳足跡與水足跡分析及標籤(Carbon and Water Footprinting and Labeling)
13　　5/12　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：綠色製程、產品設計與發展(Green Processes, Product Design and Development)
14　　5/19　　LCA 應用(LCA Applications)：廢棄物管理(Waste Management)
15　　5/26　　Special Topic: Natural Capital Accounting and LCA
16　　6/2　　期末考(Final Exam)
17　　6/19　　專題報告－分組簡報Team Project Presentation
18　　6/16　　專題報告－分組簡報Team Project Presentation
